questions: In the $ season PITCHER threw % strikes out of # pitches what was his percentage of strikes he threw?
In the $ season PITCHER gave up % earned runs in his # innings pitched, what was his earned run average for the season? Hint (earned runs/innings pitched)*(total innings(9))
In the $ season PITCHER had % strikeouts while facing # batters. What percentage of batters did he strike out?
In the $ season PITCHER faced % batters and gave up # home runs. What percentage of batters hit home runs off of him?
In the $ season PITCHER had % wins and # losses. What was his win/loss percentage?
In the $ season PLAYER had % hits and # of them were home runs what percentage of the hits were home runs?
In the $ season PLAYER had % strikeouts in his # at bats, what was his strikeout percentage?
In the $ season PLAYER had % rbi and # hits. What percentage of hits resulted in an rbi?
In the $ season PLAYER had a stolen base percentage of %, and # stolen bases, how many times was he caught stealing?
In the $ season PLAYER had % at bats and # runs. What percentage of at bats resulted in a run?
In $, the TEAM had % hits and # runs, what percentage of hits resulted in a run.
In $ the TEAM had % at bats and # hits. What percentage of at bats resulted in a hit.
In $ the TEAM had % total bases and # runs. What percentage of those bases resulted in a run?
In $, the TEAM had % at bats and $ strike outs. What percentage of at bats resulted in a strike out?
